mapper.select: select username "userName",password "passWord" from users where username=#{userName}
select role from sys_roles r,sys_users u,sys_users_roles ur where u.username=#{userName} and u.id=ur.userid and r.id=ur.roleid

select permission "permission" from sys_roles r,sys_users u,sys_users_roles ur,sys_permissions p,sys_roles_permissions rp where u.username=#{userName} and u.id=ur.user_id and r.id=ur.role_id and r.id=rp.rold_id and p.id=rp.permission_id
mapper.delete: delete from sys_users_roles where user_id=#{userId} and role_id=#{roleId}
